entry.def: In football, the kick-off is the time at which a particular game starts.
In American football, a kickoff is the kick that begins a play, for example at the beginning of a half or after a touchdown or field goal.
The kick-off of an event or activity is its beginning.

example.ex: People stood waiting for the kick-off of the parade.
example.tran: 人们站着等候游行的开始。

means.word_mean: 1. (football) a kick from the center of the field to start a football game or to resume it after a score
2. the time at which something is supposed to begin;

sentences.sentence: "she knew from the get-go that he was the man for her"
"I was there with my parents at the kickoff"
